price: Deε εwͻ soro ne asaase so nyinaa Ɔno na εyε Ne dea. Ɔno na ͻsom ne anidie nyinaa yε Ne dea aberε biara. Enti mofiri Nyankopͻn akyi suro obi foforͻ anaa?
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walahu al-dīnu wāṣiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaqūna
